title: Chinaâ€™s Politburo Has No Women, a Break With Custom
description: For the first time in decades, the Politburo has no female members. And no woman has ever been included in the even more exclusive and powerful Standing Committee.
dc:creator: Alexandra Stevenson
category: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
media:description: Shen Yiqin, the party secretary of Guizhou Province, at the party congress on Saturday.
